result.reason: The user requested a feature to lock the window size of mRemoteNG.
result.approach: Add a new option in FrmOptions to enable/disable window size locking. Store the locked size and position in Settings.cs. Modify FrmMain.cs to prevent resizing when the lock is active, potentially by handling window messages or setting MinimumSize/MaximumSize dynamically.
